name: Happy Hockey!
description:
Are you ready for a pucking good time? Welcome to Happy Hockey, the hockey-based action puzzler that’s all radical and totally free to play. Grab your stick, hit the ice, and take aim because this is the sports game you’ve been waiting for!

Playing Happy Hockey is as straightforward as it is fun, all you have to do is aim your puck, strike it with your stick, and hit the back of the net to score goals! Although you’re going to have to avoid hordes of enemy players, wacky obstacles, and, of course, the goalkeeper. It’s time to dust off your skates, head to the rink and get practicing because Happy Hockey is the skill-based game that’s going to put your brain to the test as well as your abilities with a puck. Thankfully, Happy Hockey handles like a dream, with pin-point accurate physics and seamless controls that make getting the puck past the goalposts simple, providing you’ve got the talent to score!

As you progress, you’ll come across endless levels, all of which are stunningly rendered in beautiful 3D graphics! Moreover, each level will surprise you with new challenges, obstacles, and all manner of madness to stop you from making it passed those goalposts. After all, the name of the game is scoring goals, and here, there are thousands.

Are you tired of boring sports games? Happy hockey has landed, and it’s as cool as the ice your skating on. Grab your stick, smash that puck and get ready to score because Happy Hockey is here to take over your life.
